name: 媒體訊息設計
restrict: ◎限碩一碩二碩三以上修習 ◎課程不開放上修
description: This course discusses the various aspects of message design, such as theoretical foundations, message design procedures, and evaluations. Lecturing, group discussions, exams, and oral presentations may be employed to achieve the objectives of the course.
goals: Increase knowledge about theoretical foundations of visual message design.
Develop skills in analyzing, designing, producing, implementing and evaluating media message design.
Apply visual message design principles and concepts to graphic arts communication through the development of a project.
syllabus:
Topics  
1.Overview  
2.Vision and Perception  
3.Theoretical foundations  
4.Purposes of Media Message Design (I):Instructional message design  
5.Purposes of Media Message Design (II): Entertaining message design  
6.Purposes of Media Message Design (III):Propagandist message design  
7.Purposes of Media Message Design (IV):Informational message design  
8.Purposes of Media Message Design (V): Advertising message design  
9.Presentation design (I): Attention  
10.Presentation design (II): Simple  
11.Presentation design (III):Unexpected  
12.Presentation design (IV):Concrete  
13.Presentation design (V):Credible  
14.Presentation design (VI): Emotional  
15.Presentation design (VII): Stories

methodologies.note: 小組作業需小組分工合作
視課程需要安排校外參觀學習
視課程需要邀請校外人士演講分享

grading.note: 含兩次期中作業(各占15%，共占30%)、期末作業企劃(20%)、期末媒體成品(30%)
